examples.example: 我喜欢在阳光明媚的下午，悠闲地喝着咖啡，享受美好的时光。

translate.english: I like to leisurely drink coffee and enjoy the beautiful time on a sunny afternoon.

examples.example: 每天早上喝一杯香浓的咖啡，能让我精神饱满地开始新一天的生活。

translate.english: Drinking a cup of fragrant coffee every morning can make me start a new day's life full of energy.

examples.example: 我会在工作间隙为自己冲上一杯醇香的咖啡，瞬间感觉充满了活力。

translate.english: I will make myself a cup of mellow coffee during the breaks at work and instantly feel full of energy.
